tagline: Trip planning, adventure logistics, restaurant picks, and gift sourcing — the concierge who actually listens
pros: Full trip planning from itinerary to packing list to backup plans
Covers adventure, luxury, family, and budget travel equally well
Restaurant and gift recommendations with real personalization
Builds in buffer time and contingencies — no overscheduled nightmares
cons: Doesn't book — researches and recommends, human handles payments
Generalist — a luxury travel advisor or mountaineering guide goes deeper
Needs clear preferences upfront — won't guess at what 'a nice trip' means

model_recommendations.notes: Template-following, scheduling, tracking, simple Q&A. Lightweight models save cost without sacrificing quality for these structured tasks.
